biotools.summary: FEATHER ( Force Extension Analysis using a Testable Hypothesis for Event Recognition) automatically identifies the locations of unfolding/unbinding events in single-molecule force spectroscopy records and thereby deduces the corresponding rupture force and loading rate.

bioschemas.name: FEATHER
bioschemas.summary: FEATHER ( Force Extension Analysis using a Testable Hypothesis for Event Recognition) automatically identifies the locations of unfolding/unbinding events in single-molecule force spectroscopy records and thereby deduces the corresponding rupture force and loading rate.
